name: Baseline Offsetter
description: Raise, lower, set or reset the baseline of multiple text layers with a single command.
author: Ozgur Gunes

commands.name: Set Baseline Offset
commands.description: Gets the input from user and applies the given offset to all selected text layers.

commands.name: Raise Baseline
commands.description: Increases the current baseline offset of selected text layers by `1`.

commands.name: Lower Baseline
commands.description: Decreases the current baseline offset of selected text layers by `1`.

commands.name: Use Default Baseline
commands.description: Removes any baseline offset value from selected text layers, resets them to their default.
